system.requirement: When you attempt to Heal using an ancient ceremony, add +1 and choose one (decide before rolling).

abilities.description: Channel energy: On a hit, you may take or give +3 health (instead of +2 health).
Blessed cleansing: On a hit, you may clear shaken instead of wounded and take or give +2 spirit instead of +2 health.

Bestow purpose: On a hit, take or give +2 momentum (instead of +2 health). If ayahuasca is ingested by the recipient of the Heal move, they may @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4244b77103f55bc4]{Gather Information} and add +1 as they search the visions for meaning and direction.
